m_q.target_metric: Lag (0-48 hours) that maximizes r^2 correlation between semi-major axis change (km) from TLE data and OMNI AP index during May 1-30, 2024
filters: semi-major axis change calculable from consecutive TLEs
sub_questions: Calculate semi-major axis from mean_motion using mu=398600.4418
Round TLE epoch times to nearest hour
Compute hourly change in semi-major axis
Extract AP index from OMNI2 data

schema_conflicts: TLE epoch_day is fractional day of year
OMNI2 has separate year, day, hour columns

scale_issues: TLE epoch_day has precision to 8 decimal places (seconds)
Mean motion needs conversion to semi-major axis using mu
cross_source_conflicts: TLE times need rounding to nearest hour to match OMNI2 hourly resolution
TLE data points are irregular (not hourly), need interpolation or nearest matching

format_notes: TLE file has duplicate rows (e.g., row 11-12 identical)
OMNI2 has 55 columns with cryptic names
omni2.text is documentation file, not data
AP index column needs identification from omni2.text specification

constraints: TLE epoch times must be rounded to nearest hour
derived_filters: Exclude rows where AP index is sentinel value
Ensure consecutive TLEs for change calculation
